Original:
香草窗是某次在另一間Bar跟Bartender閒聊時被推薦的店，看看地點不遠、評價也不差，就列入了待訪名單，結果因為覺得酒不錯，隔週又自己造訪一次，也算是挺有愛的。

該店的最大特色正如店名，是各式香草，第一眼就被門面的綠意吸引，內部空間不大，倒也坐得舒服；吃食水準一般，但酒不錯喝而且種類豐富，可以多來幾次也喝不完，很合我心意（笑）。

----------
【水餃】
還不錯吃，而且水餃皮挺厚，我很喜歡。

【鳥不踏乾拌麵】
帶點微辣的麻醬乾拌麵，也不錯吃。

【鹿野旋風卷】
可愛版的炸螺絲卷，沾醬是用帶有濃厚烏梅與茶香風味的酒調製而成，滋味酸甜Bartender還給我一小杯試飲，帶有濃厚烏梅與煙燻氣息，同一支酒也拿來製作這道小點的沾醬。

【鹿野QQ條】
吃著像是實心版的地瓜球，口感挺Q，甜甜的。

【雞塊】
普通的炸雞塊，趁熱才好吃。

【炸物三拼】
可從炸物中任選3樣做成拼盤，這次選的是香香雞 + 起司薯球 + 花枝圈，都挺好吃。

【瘋狂下午茶】
帶有九層塔的香氣與濃厚的柑橘甜味，茶感與酒感均輕。

【渡渡鳥】
柳橙風味濃厚，微偏甜，酒感中等。

【紅心皇后】
很夢幻的淡粉紅色澤，帶有酸甜調與胡椒香氣，挺特別，但滋味太重，致使酒感不甚明顯。

【迴蘇之森】
通寧水帶來氣泡口感與微甜滋味，香之琴酒與紫蘇讓香氣更甚，酒感輕。

【著涎茶紅】紅玉烏龍茶
除了通寧水的氣泡口感與微甜外，茶感和酒感都很明顯，挺不錯。

【烏啼夜，霜滿天】
茶感不明顯，倒更像帶有可可風味與奶蓋層卻沒有氣泡口感的Highball。

【音韻闡微】
檜木和炭香凸顯了茶感，酒感中等。

【蘋果兔腳】
白蘭地風味中帶有青蘋果酸甜與楓糖甜，酒感中等偏輕。

【奇異仙人掌】
完全是奇異果風味，略偏酸，酒感中等偏輕。
EN:
The vanilla window is a recommended shop when I chat with Bartender in another BAR. It is not far from the location and the evaluation is not bad. It is included in the list of visits. As a result, I feel that the wine is good. It is quite loving.

The biggest feature of the store is as the name of the store. It is all kinds of vanilla. At first glance, the greenness of the facade is attracted. The internal space is not large, but it is comfortable to sit. I couldn't finish drinking a few times, I was very good at my heart (laughs).

-----------
【Dumplings】
It's pretty good, and the dumpling skin is very thick, I like it very much.

[Birds do not step on dry noodles]
It is also good to eat with a little spicy hemp sauce.

【Luye Whirlwind Volume】
The cute version of the fried screw roll, the dipping sauce is made from the wine with strong black plums and tea flavor. The sweet and sour Bartender also gives me a small cup of test drink, with a strong black plum and smoky breath, the same wine, the same wine, the same wine It is also used to make this small dot sauce.

【Luye QQ strip】
Eating like a real version of sweet potato balls, the taste is very Q and sweet.

【Chicken Block】
Ordinary fried chicken pieces are delicious while it is hot.

【Three Forms of Fried Woods】
You can choose 3 to make a platter from the fried object.

【Crazy afternoon Tea】
With the aroma of nine -story tower and a strong citrus sweetness, the tea feel and wine are light.

【Dotu Bird】
The orange flavor is strong, slightly sweet, and the wine feels medium.

【Red Heart Queen】
Very dreamy light pink, with sweet and sour and pepper aroma, which is very special, but the taste is too heavy, which makes the wine feel not obvious.

【Back to Su Zhisen】
Tongning water brings a bubble taste and slightly sweet taste. The incense piano wine and the perilla make the aroma even better and the wine feels light.

[Water Tea Red] Red Jade Oolong Tea
In addition to the taste and slightly sweet taste and slightly sweet of Tong Ningshui, the tea feel and wine are obvious and pretty good.

[Black cry, frost full day]
The tea feel is not obvious, but it is more like Highball with a cocoa flavor and milk layer but no bubble taste.

【Yinyun 阐 阐】
The citrus and charcoal aroma highlight the tea, and the wine feels medium.

【Apple Rabbit Foot】
The flavor of Bailan Di has green apples and sweetness and maple sweets.

【Strange Fairy Palm】
It is a strange flavor, slightly sour, and the wine feel is medium and lighter.

Original:
身為一個人生沒特長，只會跑吧的跑吧仔
（點我歷史評論就知道）
進店前歡迎參考我的頻論，看看這家店試適不適合您

價格來看，符合在地行情，以基酒的等級來看，比起更市區的酒吧略為划算，但一樣，不適合想超便宜喝醉的朋友，便宜喝醉請參考暢飲店

但如果對於調酒，尤其是經典調酒變化版，或海外稀少琴酒類興趣的朋友，真的值得來一趟

香草窗在跑吧體驗中，算是讓我體會過最多種不同版本gin tonic的酒吧，光琴酒與通寧水就有近百種排列組合

酒吧主理人在蒐藏酒好像不用成本似的，看bar back就知道，滿滿高價逸品，有時太稀少買不到的酒，在這邊點一杯過過癮真的很爽快

環境部分配上門口的植栽與口中的琴酒香，叫「香草窗」這個名字完全符合邏輯，場地舒適不擁擠，缺點是位子不多，大日子客滿可能進不來

餐點部分因為較常吃飽過去，就沒特別測試，而且有時點稀有調酒，吃東西破壞味覺怕可惜了好東西，因此不多做評論

整體來說，是值得一訪再訪點店，吧台酒一直再增加，目前我已經看過五隻以上絕版品，剩下留給各位挖寶，是一個值得來探索與深掘的店家

2023/03更新
店家剛從日本回來，又增加更多庫存了，有夠可怕（稱讚意味

Original:
令人愉悅的舒適鄰裡地下酒吧，製作出令人驚嘆的新鮮美味雞尾酒。非常漂亮和輕鬆的花園裝飾以及超級友好和知識淵博的工作人員。他們甚至自己釀烈酒。這將成為我的常客。

老闆Dior非常關心你的體驗和雞尾酒的味道。希望你來訪時他在。
EN:
The pleasant comfortable neighborhood underground bar makes a stunning fresh and delicious cocktail.Very beautiful and relaxed garden decoration and super friendly and knowledgeable staff.They even brew their own spirits.This will become my frequent visitor.

The boss Dior is very concerned about your experience and the taste of cocktails.Hope you are here when you visit.

Original:
我們在台灣的第一天，我們找到了絕對是享用清涼飲品的最佳地點。這裡的氣氛很棒，人們也很棒。我們感覺就像在家一樣！

如果您想知道從菜單中選擇什麼，請嘗試“A Littlepiece of heaven”飲料。清爽又神奇！
EN:
On the first day of our in Taiwan, we found the best place to enjoy cool drinks.The atmosphere here is great, and people are also great.We feel like at home!

If you want to know what you choose from the menu, try "A LittlePiece of Heaven" drink.Refreshing and magical!

Original:
供應使用香草製成的雞尾酒的餐廳。
我去那裡是因為它離我的酒店很近。
一頓正餐大約2000日元，算是不錯的價格了，但是旅行的最後一天我感覺很放鬆。
草本雞尾酒有很好的甜味，非常美味。
EN:
Supply cocktails made of vanilla.
I went there because it was close to my hotel.
A meal dinner is about 2,000 yen, which is a good price, but I feel very relaxed on the last day of the trip.
Herbal cocktail has a good sweetness and very delicious.

Original: 這是我最喜歡的台北長春路酒吧。我想嚐嚐東大清酒廠的杜松子酒，所以釀酒師向我介紹了它。這是一樓的開放式酒吧，有玻璃牆，但很安靜，可以按照自己的步調走，容量也很好。尤其是用馬布金酒調製的雞尾酒非常精緻，推薦大家來台北時順便過來看看。
EN: This is my favorite Taipei Changchun Road bar.I want to taste Du Songzi wine from Dongdaqing winery, so the winemaker introduced it to me.This is the open bar on the first floor, with a glass wall, but it is very quiet. You can follow your own pace. The capacity is also very good.Especially the cocktails prepared by Mabu Golden Wine are very delicate. I recommend everyone to come and see when they come to Taipei.

Original: 很棒的飲料。可以量身訂做。迪奧的工作人員提供了優質的服務。強烈推薦！
EN: A great drink.Can be tailored.Dior's staff provides high -quality services.Recommended strongly!

Original:

（中文歌
EN:
Tea feels well, wine feels universal ...
(Chinese song

Original: 沿著中山街和赤峰街的一個隱藏發現，正在尋找一個安靜的地方喝一杯，偶然發現了這家酒吧。雞尾酒很棒，服務也很棒。主要調酒師正在參加品酒會/課程，但仍然抽出時間過來聊天。他們有各種各樣的杜松子酒，他自己釀造了杜松子酒（也獲獎）。如果您在該地區，絕對必須參觀！
EN: A hidden discovery along Zhongshan Street and Chifeng Street, I was looking for a quiet place to drink a drink, and accidentally discovered this bar.Cocktails are great and the service is great.The main bartender is attending the wine tasting/course, but still draws time to chat.They have a variety of Du Songzi wine, and he brewed Du Songzi (also award).If you are in the area, you must visit!
